name: TRACER (itch)
description:
Control:
arrows or WASD

Reset level:
R

Rewind:
F

The objective of the game consists on planning a route, meeting the requirements for the mission given at the beginning of the level, there’s a first phase of planification where the moment you start moving through the level the timer will start, but any other element won’t.

You have to plan the movement carefully since once you start the level you can't change the route you have chosen.

As we advance on levels we’ll find new elements like patrollers, timed lasers, intermittent lasers, surveillance cams and laser shooting enemies
